content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (0, 1)
- Steam engine at position (0, 2)
- Offshore pump at position (0, 3)

### Copper plate mine at position (1, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (1, 1) and a furnace at position (1, 2)
- Burner mining drill at position (1, 3) and a furnace at position (1, 4)
- Burner mining drill at position (1, 5) and a furnace at position (1, 6)

### Copper cable factory at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (2, 1) and inserter at position (2, 2) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position (1, 2) to the assembling machine at position (2, 1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting without the required machines
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machines or furnaces required for the recipes you are attempting to use.
